name: Wedding Planning
description: Create your dream wedding with our expert planning services. From venue selection to decor and catering, we handle it all.

name: Birthday Party Planning
description: Celebrate your special day with a memorable birthday party. Our planners will ensure everything runs smoothly.

name: Baby Shower Coordination
description: Welcome your new arrival with a beautiful baby shower. We take care of the details so you can focus on the joy.

name: Engagement Party Services
description: Celebrate your engagement with style. Our team will make your engagement party unforgettable.

name: Retirement Party Planning
description: Bid farewell to your career with a fantastic retirement party. Let us handle the details while you relax.

name: Anniversary Celebration
description: Mark your special milestone with an unforgettable anniversary celebration. We make every moment count.
